page.title: 16Wethersfield Amenities
page.content: Wethersfield has a parish church called St.Mary Magdalene with a tower and set of eight bells. Also it has a United Reform Church. It has a butchers,bakers,D.I.Y.and two general stores one of which is also the Post Office.There is also a hairdressers and wool shop.On the edge of the village is a boarding kennels. There is no library,but the library van calls once a week.There is a fire station which also serves many of the surrounding villages. Wethersfield has quite a large playing field which has a pavilion, swings etc.for children and tennis courts.It is used by the local primary school as well as the rest of the village. There is a village policeman who lives in the village.Also two pubs and a restaurant.
